reviewDetails.comment: Really listens to your concerns and all methods you have tried. Explains everything throughly and sets you up perfectly to avoid the things you are allergic to. Highly recommend especially if you suffer from moderate to severe eczema for years with nothing working he is the one to help you find what will work best and what your true triggers are.
Kind, personable, and took the time to ask questions since it was our first visit together. Trusted and valued my input as the patient, which can be a rare experience with doctors these days.
He's very knowledgeable and thorough.

reviewDetails.comment:
Dr Hadjiev is attentive and shows that he cares. He very detailed and you feel attended completely. Sends you home with specific instructions needed.
Love the attention given to me especially when you do not feel well.!
Dr. Hadjiev is beyond amazing, he’s is so professional, so helpful and just a lovely Dr. who takes his time with his patient's and very informative. He took amazing care of me.
Dr. Hadjiev is a very attentive and deliberate doctor. He will take the time to discuss your issues/concerns and provide you with clear and concise answers.
Dr Hadjiev is very thorough and knowledgeable and he spends time with his patients.
He spent so much time explaining everything to me even after hours. Truly caring and great doctor. Highly recommend
Very knowledgeable. Took his time to explain everything in detail and wasn’t rushing at all.
Very thorough doctor. You may have to wait a long time to get in, but its is worth it. Dr. Hadjiev really listens to his patients and is able to make larger connections that other doctors might not.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Basset is a very knowledgeable, thoughtful and thorough allergist practitioner. Both my daughter and I are patients. I highly recommend him.
Dr . Basset is an amazing caring Doctor , he is always there for his patients . A great Diagnoser and a great Alergist
Dr Bassette is very detailed oriented he takes his time with you and rush you through the first. He also very knowledgeable and personable and easy to talk to.
Very caring professional. He asks a lot of great holistic questions. Great doc!
Dr. Bassett is thorough and friendly. He wants to know full patient history and story for any consult.
Dr. Bassett is very professional. He is extrmely detail oriented, and show a great deal of care for his patient.

reviewDetails.comment: I had hopes that Dr. Ast would professionally and competently review and help diagnose my issue. He unfortunately did nothing of the kind. He didn't offer much in the way of diagnosis, or advice. What really made me feel like Dr. Ast was not giving me the attention I hoped for was our follow up visit. My first visit he sent me to get Xrays at a third party facility, and three weeks later we had our follow up. Upon that follow up he had no idea who I was, seemingly no record or memory of our first visit. He asked if I'd ever been to him before. I reminded him of the xrays which he hastily pulled up and looked at extremely quickly. It was like a kid who didn't do his homework! Very unprofessional and disappointing. I won't recommend him and won't visit Dr. Ast again.
